title: Ah! Mpira!
description: Mvulana mdogo alitumwa dukani na bibiye kununua vitu vichache. Anaambatana na rafikiye na kucheza mpira. Je,  atampelekea bibi alichotumwa?
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":134,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":135,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mimi ninapenda kucheza na rafiki yangu Chuma.
","sortOrder":0,"id":227}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":136,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mimi na Chuma tunapendana sana. Tukitumwa,  tunaenda pamoja.
","sortOrder":0,"id":228}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":137,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Siku moja nilitumwa na bibi dukani nikanunue chumvi na mafuta. Nilienda na Chuma.
","sortOrder":0,"id":229}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":138,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tukiwa njiani, tuliwaona watoto wenzetu wakicheza mpira wa miguu.
","sortOrder":0,"id":230}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":139,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mimi nilitamani sana kucheza mpira huo. Nilisema,  "Ah! Mpira!"
","sortOrder":0,"id":231}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":140,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Nilimwambia Chuma, "Twende tuwaombe kucheza nao mpira. Mimi hupenda mpira wa miguu."
","sortOrder":0,"id":232}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":141,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Chuma alinijibu, "Twende kwanza dukani, halafu turudi kucheza."
","sortOrder":0,"id":233}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":142,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Lakini, nilimwambia Chuma, "Tucheze kwanza wewe! Tukienda nyumbani bibi hataturuhusu."
","sortOrder":0,"id":234}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":143,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulikubaliwa na wenzetu tukacheza mpira. Nilikuwa golikipa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":235}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":144,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Nilijitahidi kudaka mpira. Wenzangu hawakuweza kufunga goli hata moja.
","sortOrder":0,"id":236}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":145,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Uwanja tuliochezea ulikuwa na mchanga mwingi. Magoli yake yalikuwa mawe makubwa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":237}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":146,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baada ya mchezo, tuliondoka kwenda dukani, lakini, hatukuwa na pesa. Nilianza kulia. Chuma alinikemea,  "Acha kulia. Ni wewe ulitaka tucheze kabla ya kwenda dukani."
","sortOrder":0,"id":238}]},{"sortOrder":13,"id":147,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulirudi nyumbani bila chumvi wala mafuta. Pia, tulikuwa tumechafuka kweli kweli.
","sortOrder":0,"id":239}]},{"sortOrder":14,"id":148,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulimkuta bibi amekasirika mno. Alituuliza, "Mmekuwa wapi muda huu wote?"
","sortOrder":0,"id":240}]},{"sortOrder":15,"id":149,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Alipogundua kuwa tulipoteza hela, alisema,  "Nawasamehe leo, lakini, msirudie tena kucheza bila ruhusa."
","sortOrder":0,"id":241}]},{"sortOrder":16,"id":150,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulipoona tumesamehewa, tulienda haraka kuwalisha kuku na bata. Baadaye, tulioga na kuwa wasafi.
","sortOrder":0,"id":242}]}]

title: Barua kwa Mama
description: Mama anaenda hospitalini kujifungua mtoto na bintiye anamwandikia barua.
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":40,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":41,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mama aliziweka nguo zake katika begi ndogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":71}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":42,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Alinikumbatia akasema,  "Kwa heri kwa sasa."
","sortOrder":0,"id":72}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":43,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
"Mama unaenda wapi?" Nilimwuliza.
","sortOrder":0,"id":73}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":44,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Nilianza kulia nikitaka kumfuata.
","sortOrder":0,"id":74},{"originalText":"
Baba alinibeba akanituliza.
","sortOrder":1,"id":75}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":45,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baba alisema, "Mamako anaenda hospitalini kujifungua mtoto."
","sortOrder":0,"id":76}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":46,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Niliposikia 'mtoto' sikulia tena.
","sortOrder":0,"id":77},{"originalText":"
"Kwa nini aende hospitalini?"
","sortOrder":1,"id":78}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":47,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baba alinijibu, "Nitakueleza kwa nini anaenda hospitalini."
","sortOrder":0,"id":79}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":48,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Baba alinieleza lakini sikuelewa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":80},{"originalText":"
Nilimwuliza, "Ataendelea kunipenda?"
","sortOrder":1,"id":81}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":49,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Alinieleza, "Tutakupenda wakati wote."
","sortOrder":0,"id":82}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":50,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
"Ninaweza kumwandikia barua akiwa huko?" Nilimwuliza baba.
","sortOrder":0,"id":83}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":51,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Jioni hiyo, nilianza kumtungia mama barua.
","sortOrder":0,"id":84}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":52,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Nilichukuwa karatasi na kuanza kuandika.
","sortOrder":0,"id":85}]},{"sortOrder":13,"id":53,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mama, mama! Baba alisema kwamba umeenda kumleta mtoto mwingine.
","sortOrder":0,"id":86}]},{"sortOrder":14,"id":54,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tafadhali, fanya haraka urudi nyumbani.
","sortOrder":0,"id":87}]},{"sortOrder":15,"id":55,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Ningependa umlete mtoto msichana.
","sortOrder":0,"id":88},{"originalText":"
Nitacheza naye akiwa mkubwa.
","sortOrder":1,"id":89}]},{"sortOrder":16,"id":56,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Unaweza kuwaleta wawili.
","sortOrder":0,"id":90},{"originalText":"
Mmoja atakuwa wangu.
","sortOrder":1,"id":91}]},{"sortOrder":17,"id":57,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Ninakusubiri hapa nyumbani.
","sortOrder":0,"id":92}]},{"sortOrder":18,"id":58,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Niliikunja barua yangu ili baba ampelekee mama.
","sortOrder":0,"id":93},{"originalText":"
Asubuhi, barua haikuwepo.
","sortOrder":1,"id":94}]}]

title: Binti wa Mflame Kayanja
description: Hadithi ya mapenzi yenye huzuni kumhusu binti mrembo wa kifalme anayeamua kufuata moyo wake badala ya alivyotaka babake.
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":116,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":117,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Hapo zamani za kale, aliishi Mfalme kwa jina Kayanja. Waliishi katika kasri kubwa yeye, mkewe malkia na Apenyo binti yao. Apenyo alikuwa msichana mrembo. Kila mwanmme alitaka kumwoa,  lakini mfalme Kayanja alitaka mahari ya juu sana.
","sortOrder":0,"id":203}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":118,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Karibu na kasri la mfalme Kayanja, aliishi Chifu Aludah Mkuu. Aliitwa 'Mkuu' kwa sababu kila aliyeishi pale kijijini, alimtii. Chifu Aludah alikuwa amempoteza mkewe kutokana na ugonjwa wa malaria. Alitaka kuoa mke mwingine.
","sortOrder":0,"id":204}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":119,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Chifu Aludah alikuwa mzee mfupi mwenye upara. Aliamua kupeleka mahari kwa Mfalme Kayanja ili amwoe bintiye. Walipokuwa wakijadili mahari,  kijakazi wa Mfalme, kwa jina Kakembo, aliyasikia mazungumzo yao. Kakembo alikuwa na uhusiano wa karibu sana na Apenyo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":205}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":120,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Chifu Aludah alikubali kumpa Mfalme Kayanja nusu ya mali yake. Pia alileta sindano ambayo ilikuwa sehemu ya mahari aliyoleta. Matayarisho ya harusi yalifanywa kisisrisiri baina ya Mfalme Kayanja na Chifu Aludah. Mfalme Kayanja alijua kwamba bintiye hangefurahia uamuzi huo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":206}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":121,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Juma moja kabla ya siku ya harusi hiyo ya kifalme,  Kakembo alimwambia Apenyo, "Mpendwa binti-mfalme, babako amepanga kukuoza kwa Chifu Aludah. Harusi itafanyika katika muda wa juma moja."
","sortOrder":0,"id":207}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":122,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Apenyo alishtuka asijue la kufanya. Aliwaza, "Kamwe sitaolewa na yule mzee mwenye upara. Kamwe! Lazima nimwone Trevor, mpenzi wangu, achukue hatua bila kupoteza muda."
","sortOrder":0,"id":208}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":123,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Usiku huo Apenyo alitoroka. Babake angegundua alikokuwa akienda angekasirika sana. Alipitia kwenye msitu wa giza wenye mawe. Mwishowe, akafika kwa Trevor. Alipowasili nyumbani kwa Trevor, alikuwa amechoka, mwenye njaa na kiu.
","sortOrder":0,"id":209}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":124,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Trevor alimkaribisha. "Mpenzi wangu, mbona ukakimbia umbali huu peke yako usiku?" Trevor aliuliza. Alimletea maji ya kunywa kisha akatulia kumsubiri Apenyo aongee.
","sortOrder":0,"id":210}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":125,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Apenyo alikunywa maji, akashusha pumzi na kusema, "Babangu anataka kunioza kwa chifu Aludah Mkuu. Lakini, siwezi kuolewa na yule mzee mwovu. Trevor, ningependa kuolewa nawe hata kama wewe ni maskini. Ninakupenda."
","sortOrder":0,"id":211}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":126,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
"Lakini sina chochote cha kulipia mahari." Trevor alilalama. Apenyo alijibu, "Naelewa, lakini nataka kuolewa na wewe tu." Aliwaza kwa muda kisha akasema, "Hebu twende kwa Kategga, mwenye mashua, atuvushe hadi upande mwingine wa mto tumuepuke babangu."
","sortOrder":0,"id":212}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":127,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mfalme Kayanja alipogundua kuwa bintiye ametoweka, aliamuru msako ufanywe kijijini. Walinzi na askari walimtafuta Apenyo kila mahali lakini hawakumpata. Walirudi na kumwambia Mfalme kwamba Apenyo hakuonekana popote. "Basi tafuteni pia vichakani," Mfalme Kayanja aliamrisha kwa hasira.
","sortOrder":0,"id":213}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":128,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Trevor na Apenyo walipokuwa wakiharakisha kwenda mtoni, mawingu meusi yalianza kukusanyika angani. Dhoruba kubwa ilikuwa inakaribia.
","sortOrder":0,"id":214}]},{"sortOrder":13,"id":129,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kategga, mwenye mashua, alikuwa anafunga mashua yake Trevor na Apenyo walipofika. Trevor alimwmomba Kategga awavukishe hadi ng'ambo ya pili ya mto. Kategga alikataa akawaelezea kwamba dhoruba kali ilikuwa inakaribia na ingekuwa hatari kuvuka.
","sortOrder":0,"id":215}]},{"sortOrder":14,"id":130,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Trevor alisizitiza huku akimwelezea kwa nini itawalazimu kuvuka wakati huo. Alitia mkono mfukoni na kutoa kete yenye thamani na kumpa Kategga. Kategga aliwaonea huruma akakubali kuwavusha haraka kabla ya dhoruba.
","sortOrder":0,"id":216}]},{"sortOrder":15,"id":131,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kategga aliivuta mashua ukingoni. Wakaabiri na kuanza safari. Mfalme Kayanja na Chifu Aludah walipofika ufukweni, waliowaona watu watatu mashuani wakivuka. Wakatambua kwamba Apenyo alikuwa anatoroka.
","sortOrder":0,"id":217}]},{"sortOrder":16,"id":132,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Dhoruba kali ilisababisha mawimbi makubwa. Kategga alishindwa kudhibiti mashua. Mfalme alilia, "Apenyo, tafadhali rudi! Nimewasamehe." Mayowe yake yalikuwa ya bure. Mashua ilipinduka wote wakazama. Tangu siku hiyo, walioishi katika ufalme wa Kayanja, walimwoa waliyemtaka, tajiri au maskini.
","sortOrder":0,"id":218}]}]

title: Furaha na Huzuni
description: Mitungo inayochunguza hisia na kinachowafanya watu kukasirika,  kufurahi au kuhuzunika.
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":14,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":15,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa nini mtoto analia?
","sortOrder":0,"id":26}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":16,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Labda ana njaa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":27}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":17,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa nini mvulana huyu amehuzunika?
","sortOrder":0,"id":28}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":18,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Labda anamkosa baba yake.
","sortOrder":0,"id":29}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":19,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa nini msichana huyu amefurahi?
","sortOrder":0,"id":30}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":20,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa sababu amepata rinda jipya.
","sortOrder":0,"id":31}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":21,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa nini mzee huyo anacheka?
","sortOrder":0,"id":32}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":22,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa sababu amesoma kichekesho.
","sortOrder":0,"id":33}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":23,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kwa nini mama huyu anatabasamu?
","sortOrder":0,"id":34}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":24,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Watoto wake wanasoma kimya kimya.
","sortOrder":0,"id":35}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":25,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mbona mama huyu anatazama chini?
","sortOrder":0,"id":36}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":26,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Anaona haya.
","sortOrder":0,"id":37}]}]

title: Jumamosi moja
description: Jumamosi moja alasiri watoto watatu wanaenda kucheza karibu na mto. Wanapotaka kwenda nyumbani tena,  hawazipati nguo zao. Watajielezaje kwa mamao?
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":28,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":29,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Jumamosi moja mama alisema, "Brenda, Mary na Lona, nendeni mcheze!"
","sortOrder":0,"id":47}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":30,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Lona alisema, "Twende tuogelee."
","sortOrder":0,"id":48},{"originalText":"
Brenda alijibu, "Mama alitukataza."
","sortOrder":1,"id":49}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":31,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulivua viatu na nguo tukacheza majini.
","sortOrder":0,"id":50}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":32,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulicheza kwa muda mfupi.
","sortOrder":0,"id":51},{"originalText":"
Tulicheka na kushangilia.
","sortOrder":1,"id":52}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":33,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baadaye, nilisema alisema, "Hebu tuogelee. Mama hatajua."
","sortOrder":0,"id":53}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":34,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulipomaliza kuogelea, nguo zetu hazikuwepo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":54},{"originalText":"
Tulihisi baridi.
","sortOrder":1,"id":55}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":35,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulizitafuta kila mahali.
","sortOrder":0,"id":56},{"originalText":"
Hatukuzipata.
","sortOrder":1,"id":57}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":36,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baadaye, Brenda alisema, "Tazama! Ng'ombe anakula shati la Lona."
","sortOrder":0,"id":58}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":37,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tulimwona ng'ombe mwingine.
","sortOrder":0,"id":59},{"originalText":"
"Anakula sketi yangu!" nilisema alisema.
","sortOrder":1,"id":60}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":38,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
"Mama, ng'ombe walikula nguo zetu."
","sortOrder":0,"id":61},{"originalText":"
Adhabu aliyotupa, hatutaisahau.
","sortOrder":1,"id":62}]}]

title: Kubwa na Ndogo
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":1,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":2,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kofia kubwa, kofia ndogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":1}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":3,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Yohana amevaa kofia kubwa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":2},{"originalText":"
Ngugi amevaa kofia ndogo.
","sortOrder":1,"id":3}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":4,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mikono mikubwa, mikono midogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":4}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":5,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baba ana mikono mikubwa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":5},{"originalText":"
Mtoto ana mikono midogo.
","sortOrder":1,"id":6}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":6,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mbuzi mkubwa, mbuzi mdogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":7}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":7,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mbuzi mkubwa alikula kitabu kidogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":8},{"originalText":"
Mbuzi mdogo alikula kitabu kikubwa.
","sortOrder":1,"id":9}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":8,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kitabu kikubwa, kitabu kidogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":10}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":9,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mtoto anasoma kitabu kikubwa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":11},{"originalText":"
Baba anasoma kitabu kidogo.
","sortOrder":1,"id":12}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":10,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tabasamu kubwa, tabasamu ndogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":13}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":11,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Baba ana tabasamu kubwa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":14},{"originalText":"
Mtoto ana tabasamu ndogo.
","sortOrder":1,"id":15}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":12,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kubwa na ndogo!
","sortOrder":0,"id":16}]}]

title: Kuku na Jongoo
description: Hii ni hadithi ya Kuku na Jongoo (kiwango cha 4),  ambayo imebadilishwa kufaa kiwango cha 1.
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":60,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":61,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku na Jongoo walikuwa marafiki.
","sortOrder":0,"id":103}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":62,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Walienda kucheza mpira wa miguu.
","sortOrder":0,"id":104}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":63,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku alikuwa golikipa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":105}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":64,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Jongoo alilifunga bao.
","sortOrder":0,"id":106}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":65,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku alikasirika sana.
","sortOrder":0,"id":107}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":66,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku aliamua kummeza Jongoo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":108}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":67,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku alipoondoka uwanjani, alikutana na Mama yake Jongoo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":109}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":68,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Jongoo aliyemezwa alilia,  "Mama nisaidie. Nimemezwa."
","sortOrder":0,"id":110}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":69,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Jongoo alikuwa na ladha mbaya sana. Kuku alihisi kutapika.
","sortOrder":0,"id":111}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":70,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku alikohoa kumtema Jongoo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":112}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":71,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Jongoo alipotemwa,  alitoroka na kwenda zake.
","sortOrder":0,"id":113}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":72,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kuku na Jongoo walikuwa maadui tangu siku hiyo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":114}]}]

title: Kuwahesabu Wanyama
description: Wanyama wote wana kiu. Wahesabu wanapoenda kunywa maji.
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":74,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":75,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tembo mmoja anaenda kunywa maji.
","sortOrder":0,"id":123}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":76,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Twiga wawili wanaenda kunywa maji.
","sortOrder":0,"id":124}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":77,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Nyati watatu na ndege wanne pia wanaenda kunywa maji.
","sortOrder":0,"id":125}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":78,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Swala watano na nguruwe mwitu sita wanakaribia mahali kuna maji.
","sortOrder":0,"id":126}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":79,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Pundamilia saba wanakimbia kuelekea mahali kuna maji.
","sortOrder":0,"id":127}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":80,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Chura wanane na samaki tisa wanaogelea majini.
","sortOrder":0,"id":128}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":81,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Simba mmoja ananguruma. Anataka kunywa maji. Ni nani anamwogopa simba?
","sortOrder":0,"id":129}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":82,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tembo mmoja anakunywa maji pamoja na simba.
","sortOrder":0,"id":130}]}]

title: Kwa nini Yayeri ni mashuhuri?
description: Hadithi inasimulia matendo msichana mdogo anayafanya ambayo yanafanya kuwa mashuhuri. Je,  kwa nini?
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":84,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":85,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Yayeri anaamka mapema.
","sortOrder":0,"id":140},{"originalText":"
Tunajiuliza, "Kwa nini Yayeri ni mashuhuri?"
","sortOrder":1,"id":141}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":86,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Anashukuru kwa usiku uliopita. Tunajiuliza, "Kwa nini Yayeri ni mashuhuri?"
","sortOrder":0,"id":142}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":87,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"

title: Magozwe
description: Mvulana mdogo anajipata mtaani pamoja na watoto wengine wanaorandaranda. Katika hali ya kujitafutia,  anakutana na mtu ambaye anabadilisha maisha yake.
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":98,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":99,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Kulikuwa na wavulana wa kurandaranda mtaani.
","sortOrder":0,"id":172},{"originalText":"
Mdogo wao aliitwa Magozwe.
","sortOrder":1,"id":173}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":100,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Wazazi wa Magozwe walikufa akiwa mdogo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":174},{"originalText":"
Alienda kuishi na mjombake.
","sortOrder":1,"id":175}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":101,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Mjombake alimtesa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":176},{"originalText":"
Magozwe alitorokea mtaani.
","sortOrder":1,"id":177}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":102,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Maisha ya mtaa yalikuwa magumu.
","sortOrder":0,"id":178},{"originalText":"
Waliishi kwa kuombaomba.
","sortOrder":1,"id":179}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":103,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Siku moja, Magozwe aliokota kitabu cha hadithi kwenye pipa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":180}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":104,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Picha zilionyesha rubani.
","sortOrder":0,"id":181},{"originalText":"
Magozwe alitamani kuwa rubani mashuhuri.
","sortOrder":1,"id":182}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":105,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Magozwe alikuwa akiomba chakula barabarani.
","sortOrder":0,"id":183},{"originalText":"
Alikutana na Tomaso.
","sortOrder":1,"id":184}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":106,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Tomaso aliwapeleka pahali walikopata chakula.
","sortOrder":0,"id":185}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":107,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Siku moja, Magozwe alimwambia Tomaso, "Sijui kusoma."
","sortOrder":0,"id":186}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":108,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Magozwe pia alimweleza kwa nini alitoroka kwa mjombake.
","sortOrder":0,"id":187}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":109,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Magozwe alisherehekea miaka kumi ya kuzaliwa.
","sortOrder":0,"id":188},{"originalText":"
Tomaso alimpatia kitabu.
","sortOrder":1,"id":189}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":110,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Magozwe alifikiria juu ya kwenda shule.
","sortOrder":0,"id":190}]},{"sortOrder":13,"id":111,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Ingawa aliogopa, Tomaso alimtia moyo.
","sortOrder":0,"id":191}]},{"sortOrder":14,"id":112,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Magozwe alipelekwa katika makao ya watoto.
","sortOrder":0,"id":192}]},{"sortOrder":15,"id":113,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
Alisoma kwa bidii.
","sortOrder":0,"id":193}]},{"sortOrder":16,"id":114,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
